ygData.subject: Can I further customized Hentrix for crawling weblogs?

I am interested to build a web crawler to crawl pages from blog site
s=
uch as blogspot.

tweak hentrix
to maybe crawl 50 to 1000 blogs for research purpose? I am
on=
ly looking at text and nothing else.

it is possible?

ld like to cite your website and acknowledge
